MESSAGE.JP: 付き合い始めたということを、実感する。
MESSAGE.EN: It made me realize that the two of us had really started going out.
MESSAGE.Translation: It made me realize that the two of us had really started going out.

MESSAGE.JP: ちなみに最後の記号はなんだろう？　顔文字のようだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: And what's that thing in the end? Looks like an emoticon, but...
MESSAGE.Translation: And what's that thing in the end? Looks like an emoticon, but...

MESSAGE.JP: どうみても無表情…素の顔だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It looks like an expression of complete indifference... An emotionless face.
MESSAGE.Translation: It looks like an expression of complete indifference... An emotionless face.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰の入れ知恵かは知らないけど、素の顔をわざわざ顔文字にして表す必要があるのだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't know who taught her this, but what purpose is there in using an emoticon that doesn't indicate anything...
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't know who taught her this, but what purpose is there in using an emoticon that doesn't indicate anything...

MESSAGE.JP: 笑顔で返してみよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I answered her with a smiling emoticon.
MESSAGE.Translation: I answered her with a smiling emoticon.

MESSAGE.JP: 『元気だよ(^^)』
MESSAGE.EN: [I'm fine (^^)]
MESSAGE.Translation: [I'm fine (^^)]

MESSAGE.JP: すぐ返事が戻ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: She answered immediately.
MESSAGE.Translation: She answered immediately.

MESSAGE.JP: 『それはよかった(∵)』
MESSAGE.EN: [Glad to hear that (-.-)]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Glad to hear that (-.-)]

MESSAGE.JP: なんかどーでもよさそうだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: It totally doesn't look like she cares...
MESSAGE.Translation: It totally doesn't look like she cares...

MESSAGE.JP: 無表情以外のリアクションを求めてみよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll try to get a different expression out of her...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll try to get a different expression out of her...

MESSAGE.JP: 『横で真人が邪魔されたって泣いてるよ（笑）』
MESSAGE.EN: [Masato is lamenting about how you're getting in our way (haha)]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Masato is lamenting about how you're getting in our way (haha)]

MESSAGE.JP: そう送ってみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I settled on this.
MESSAGE.Translation: I settled on this.

MESSAGE.JP: 『はははは(∵)』
MESSAGE.EN: [Hahaha (-.-)]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Hahaha (-.-)]

MESSAGE.JP: 笑ってない、笑ってない。
MESSAGE.EN: You're not laughing. You're so not laughing.
MESSAGE.Translation: You're not laughing. You're so not laughing.

MESSAGE.JP: かなり恐い。
MESSAGE.EN: This is scary.
MESSAGE.Translation: This is scary.

MESSAGE.JP: でもなんだかこういう無駄なメールのやりとりも今は楽しく感じられた。
MESSAGE.EN: But exchanging meaningless emails with her like this is fun in itself.
MESSAGE.Translation: But exchanging meaningless emails with her like this is fun in itself.

MESSAGE.JP: 翌朝のＨＲ。担任はいつになく渋い表情をしている。
MESSAGE.EN: During the homeroom period the following day, our homeroom teacher had an even sterner expression on his face than usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: During the homeroom period the following day, our homeroom teacher had an even sterner expression on his face than usual.

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「本校の理事長が、県議会委員の方と一緒に視察に来られる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝It has been decided that our school's superintendent, accompanied by a member of the prefectural assembly, will be paying us a visit for an inspection.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝It has been decided that our school's superintendent, accompanied by a member of the prefectural assembly, will be paying us a visit for an inspection.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「そこで、職員会議の結果、特にこのクラスを重点的に見てもらうことになった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝It was discussed in the staff meeting, and we reached the conclusion that this class needs the most attention.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝It was discussed in the staff meeting, and we reached the conclusion that this class needs the most attention.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そういうことか…。
MESSAGE.EN: So that's what it was about...
MESSAGE.Translation: So that's what it was about...

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「理由はわかるな、井ノ原！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝I hope you understand why, Inohara!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝I hope you understand why, Inohara!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「わかりません！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I don't!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I don't!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「だからだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝That's why!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝That's why!❞

MESSAGE.JP: さすがこのクラスの担任だ…応戦している…。
MESSAGE.EN: As expected of our homeroom teacher... He fights back...
MESSAGE.Translation: As expected of our homeroom teacher... He fights back...

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「でだ、このクラスから、理事長方の案内役を選出せねばならん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝That's the reason why we need someone from this class to show them around the school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝That's the reason why we need someone from this class to show them around the school.❞

MESSAGE.EN: Eh...
MESSAGE.Translation: Eh...

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「とりあえず自主性を尊重してみようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Let's see if anyone's going to volunteer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Let's see if anyone's going to volunteer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「したい奴は手を挙げろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝If you want to volunteer for this role, raise your hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝If you want to volunteer for this role, raise your hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: …次なる課題はこのことだったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Is this the next task we were given?
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Is this the next task we were given?

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴のほうを見ると、必死にメールを打っている…。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at Rin, who was frantically typing an email...
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at Rin, who was frantically typing an email...

MESSAGE.JP: すぐ僕の携帯が震える。
MESSAGE.EN: My cellphone vibrated a moment later.
MESSAGE.Translation: My cellphone vibrated a moment later.

MESSAGE.JP: 『これかΣ(∵)』
MESSAGE.EN: [Is that it Σ(-.-)]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Is that it Σ(-.-)]

MESSAGE.JP: ああ、顔文字が進化してる！
MESSAGE.EN: Oh, the emoticon has evolved!
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh, the emoticon has evolved!

MESSAGE.JP: って、そんなことどうでもいい！
MESSAGE.EN: Wait, it doesn't matter now!
MESSAGE.Translation: Wait, it doesn't matter now!

MESSAGE.JP: 『そうだよ、このことだよ』
MESSAGE.EN: [Yeah, that must be it.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Yeah, that must be it.]

MESSAGE.JP: すぐそう返す。
MESSAGE.EN: I answered her promptly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I answered her promptly.

MESSAGE.JP: また返ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Another email followed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Another email followed.

MESSAGE.JP: 『なにーΣ(∵)』
MESSAGE.EN: [Say what! Σ(-.-)]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Say what! Σ(-.-)]

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴…遊んでるのかな…。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin... Are you just fooling around...
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin... Are you just fooling around...

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「やっぱり誰もいないか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝As expected, no one...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝As expected, no one...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 先生の諦めたような声が。
MESSAGE.EN: The teacher was about to give up.
MESSAGE.Translation: The teacher was about to give up.

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「じゃ、学級委員に…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Then, the class rep will...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Then, the class rep will...❞

MESSAGE.JP: まずい…。
MESSAGE.EN: This is bad...
MESSAGE.Translation: This is bad...

MESSAGE.JP: 『手を挙げないと課題を達成できないよ！』
MESSAGE.EN: [If you don't raise your hand, we won't be able to complete the task!]
MESSAGE.Translation: [If you don't raise your hand, we won't be able to complete the task!]

MESSAGE.JP: 急いで打って送信。
MESSAGE.EN: I typed an email in panic.
MESSAGE.Translation: I typed an email in panic.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴はそのメールを見て、覚悟を決めたように、うん、と頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: She read it and nodded after mustering up her courage.
MESSAGE.Translation: She read it and nodded after mustering up her courage.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、恐る恐る手を挙げてみせた。
MESSAGE.EN: Then, she timidly raised her hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then, she timidly raised her hand.

MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Mm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Mm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: それに担任が気付く。
MESSAGE.EN: The teacher noticed it.
MESSAGE.Translation: The teacher noticed it.

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「棗、それはなんだ？　手を挙げているのか？　それとも脇に汗でもかいて乾かしているのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Natsume, what is this? Are you raising your hand? Or are you drying your sweaty armpits?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Natsume, what is this? Are you raising your hand? Or are you drying your sweaty armpits?❞

MESSAGE.JP: うわぁ…頑張って挙げたのに、そんな思いとどまらせるようなことを…。
MESSAGE.EN: Whoa... It took her a lot of courage to raise her hand, and now that...
MESSAGE.Translation: Whoa... It took her a lot of courage to raise her hand, and now that...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は手を引っ込めにかかってしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: She was about to drop her hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was about to drop her hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の手は縮こまって降ろされた。
MESSAGE.EN: Her raised hand shrunk, and fell back down.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her raised hand shrunk, and fell back down.

MESSAGE.JP: 結局案内役は、学級委員の女子と、謙吾に決まった。
MESSAGE.EN: In the end, our class rep and Kengo had the job pushed onto them.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the end, our class rep and Kengo had the job pushed onto them.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾はその日一日は制服姿でなければならないことに憂鬱を感じている様子だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo, who would be forced to wear his uniform for the whole day, looked depressed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo, who would be forced to wear his uniform for the whole day, looked depressed.

MESSAGE.JP: ＨＲが終わるとすぐ鈴が走ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Once homeroom was over, Rin ran up to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Once homeroom was over, Rin ran up to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「立候補できなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I couldn't nominate myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I couldn't nominate myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I know...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I know...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 課題は今日のＨＲで立候補すること。
MESSAGE.EN: That had been our task this time.
MESSAGE.Translation: That had been our task this time.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「どうなるんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's going to happen now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's going to happen now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今からでも替わってもらう？　それは可能だと思うけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can't you ask to switch places? I think it should be possible.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can't you ask to switch places? I think it should be possible.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うーん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「それができないから、手を挙げきれなかったんだが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I couldn't even raise my hand, so that's impossible...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I couldn't even raise my hand, so that's impossible...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: ということは、今の鈴にはまだ高すぎるハードルということだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Which meant, it was still too high a hurdle for Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Which meant, it was still too high a hurdle for Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: ここまで色々とありながらも、課題をクリアしてきた鈴だったけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: There had been many problems up until now, and she had managed to clear them all, but...
MESSAGE.Translation: There had been many problems up until now, and she had managed to clear them all, but...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ここまでだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝This is the end then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝This is the end then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「やっぱり終わりなのかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝So it's going to end here after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝So it's going to end here after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、恐らくね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, most likely.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, most likely.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「悔しいが、仕方がない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I hate to accept it, but it can't be helped then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I hate to accept it, but it can't be helped then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あたしの精一杯はここまでだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I gave it everything I got, but could only make it so far.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I gave it everything I got, but could only make it so far.❞

MESSAGE.JP: でも、と僕は思う。
MESSAGE.EN: However, I thought to myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: However, I thought to myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 課題に奔走していた日々を終え、僕たちだけの時間が増えるだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: We've been so frantic about trying to solve all these tasks, but now that it's over maybe we can finally get back to our normal everyday life.
MESSAGE.Translation: We've been so frantic about trying to solve all these tasks, but now that it's over maybe we can finally get back to our normal everyday life.

MESSAGE.JP: それを考えると、終わってよかったのかもしれない、と思った。
MESSAGE.EN: From this perspective, perhaps it was for the best.
MESSAGE.Translation: From this perspective, perhaps it was for the best.

MESSAGE.JP: 『がんばれ！』
MESSAGE.EN: [Go for it!]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Go for it!]

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は背を押すように、そうメールを続けて送った。
MESSAGE.EN: I sent her an email to give her a friendly push in the back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I sent her an email to give her a friendly push in the back.

MESSAGE.JP: それを確認した後、もう一度、手をまっすぐに挙げ、そして口を開いた。
MESSAGE.EN: As she read it, she raised her hand straight up again and said:
MESSAGE.Translation: As she read it, she raised her hand straight up again and said:

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「前者だ、ぼけぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝The former, moron...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝The former, moron...❞

MESSAGE.JP: やった！
MESSAGE.EN: She did it!
MESSAGE.Translation: She did it!

MESSAGE.JP: しかし、ぼけぇはない！
MESSAGE.EN: ...She didn't have to call him ❛moron,❜ though!
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She didn't have to call him ❛moron,❜ though!

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「その自主性は大変好ましいが、言葉遣いに問題ありだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝I commend your spirit, but I have some issues with your choice of words.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝I commend your spirit, but I have some issues with your choice of words.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その前に脇に汗をかいたとか、先に煽ったのは先生のほうじゃないか！という反論の声が男子生徒から上がり、教室内がざわめき始める。
MESSAGE.EN: ❛Isn't it his fault for saying stuff about sweaty armpits and whatnot!❜ ――The classroom filled with objections from the boys.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛Isn't it his fault for saying stuff about sweaty armpits and whatnot!❜ ――The classroom filled with objections from the boys.

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「静かに、わかったわかった、先生も悪かった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Quiet down, I get it, I get it. It was my fault.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Quiet down, I get it, I get it. It was my fault.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あたしも悪かった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I was in the wrong, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I was in the wrong, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: お互い謝り合い、場は静まる。
MESSAGE.EN: They apologized to each other and the uproar in the classroom subsided.
MESSAGE.Translation: They apologized to each other and the uproar in the classroom subsided.

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「女子は決まった、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝A representative from the girls is decided.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝A representative from the girls is decided.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「後はもうひとり、男子。誰かいないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝We need a boy now. Any volunteers?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝We need a boy now. Any volunteers?❞

MESSAGE.JP: この展開は予想していなかった…。
MESSAGE.EN: This was an unexpected development...
MESSAGE.Translation: This was an unexpected development...

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「誰もいないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝No one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝No one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「じゃ、無難なところで男子は宮沢に頼む」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Then, to be safe, let's entrust Miyazawa with this task.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Then, to be safe, let's entrust Miyazawa with this task.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「では、ふたりとも。我が校の代表足るよう尽力してくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝You two will be representing our whole school, so do your best not to tarnish its name.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝You two will be representing our whole school, so do your best not to tarnish its name.❞

MESSAGE.JP: もうひとりは謙吾に決まってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo was chosen.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo was chosen.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「どうして俺なんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Why me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Why me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「理樹、鈴が立候補していたのに、なぜおまえも挙手しなかったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Riki, even though Rin nominated herself, why didn't you raise your hand?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Riki, even though Rin nominated herself, why didn't you raise your hand?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾に詰め寄られる。
MESSAGE.EN: He reproached me.
MESSAGE.Translation: He reproached me.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、いや…それは…勇気が出なくて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... I just... didn't have enough courage...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... I just... didn't have enough courage...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「鈴があんなに頑張ったのにか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Even though Rin was trying so hard?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Even though Rin was trying so hard?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「情けない話だな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Talk about pathetic...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Talk about pathetic...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「部活の時間も奪われるし、わざわざ制服も着なくちゃいけない。こっちは失うものばかりじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I won't be able to spend time with the club and will have to wear the uniform. Why do I have to suffer like this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I won't be able to spend time with the club and will have to wear the uniform. Why do I have to suffer like this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 制服は指定通り着なくちゃいけないと思うけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: You're disregarding the school regulations by wearing it in the first place...
MESSAGE.Translation: You're disregarding the school regulations by wearing it in the first place...

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「遊ぶ時間も奪われるし、このリトルバスターズジャンパーも一日封印しなくてはならない…こっちは失うものばかりじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I won't have time to fool around, and as the finishing blow, this Little Busters jacket will be out of limits for the whole day... Why do I have to suffer like this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I won't have time to fool around, and as the finishing blow, this Little Busters jacket will be out of limits for the whole day... Why do I have to suffer like this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あたしも理樹がよかったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'd prefer Riki too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'd prefer Riki too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「みろ、聞いたか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Look, you see?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Look, you see?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 本当情けない話だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I really am pathetic...
MESSAGE.Translation: I really am pathetic...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は僕の彼女だってのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin is my girlfriend, yet I...
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin is my girlfriend, yet I...

MESSAGE.JP: その彼氏が何もしないでいてどうするんだ？
MESSAGE.EN: How could the boyfriend not do anything in this situation?
MESSAGE.Translation: How could the boyfriend not do anything in this situation?

MESSAGE.JP: 彼氏失格だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I have failed her...
MESSAGE.Translation: I have failed her...

MESSAGE.JP: もし許されるなら…今からでも替わりたい。
MESSAGE.EN: To redeem myself... I really want to change places with him.
MESSAGE.Translation: To redeem myself... I really want to change places with him.

MESSAGE.JP: そういう気持ちに駆られた。
MESSAGE.EN: Driven by these emotions, I rushed to see the teacher.
MESSAGE.Translation: Driven by these emotions, I rushed to see the teacher.

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「ああ、言い忘れていた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Oh, I forgot to mention this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Oh, I forgot to mention this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 担任が教室に戻ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: He just returned to the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: He just returned to the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 誰かが僕の気持ちを察知して、送り返してくれた、そんなタイミングで。
MESSAGE.EN: It was as if someone who had seen my feelings had sent him back.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was as if someone who had seen my feelings had sent him back.

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「宮沢、しばらくはちゃんと制服を着てこい。いいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Miyazawa, you'll have to properly wear your uniform for a while. Is that clear?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Miyazawa, you'll have to properly wear your uniform for a while. Is that clear?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あの、先生っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Excuse me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Excuse me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 間髪を入れず僕は訴えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I appealed to him straight away.
MESSAGE.Translation: I appealed to him straight away.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「謙吾と替わらせてください！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Please let me take Kengo's place!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Please let me take Kengo's place!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「ん？　何の件だ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Mm? What are you talking about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Mm? What are you talking about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さっき決めた案内役の件です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝About that escort thing you decided on earlier.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝About that escort thing you decided on earlier.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「宮沢と替わりたい、と？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝You want to switch with Miyazawa?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝You want to switch with Miyazawa?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「宮沢は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Miyazawa?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Miyazawa?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾に訊いた。
MESSAGE.EN: He asked Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: He asked Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「まだまだ頼りない奴ですが、これを機に頑張ろうとしているようなのでお譲りします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝He's not reliable enough yet, but I think it'd be a good chance for him to show what he can do, so I'll pass him the baton.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝He's not reliable enough yet, but I think it'd be a good chance for him to show what he can do, so I'll pass him the baton.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「そうか。じゃ、直枝、頼むぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝All right. Don't let me down, Naoe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝All right. Don't let me down, Naoe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「制服のほうはもう着ないでもいいですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝So I won't need to wear the uniform anymore?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝So I won't need to wear the uniform anymore?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「ああ、もう好きにしてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Oh, do as you wish.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Oh, do as you wish.❞

MESSAGE.JP: うわあ、好きにしてもいいんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Whoa, is it really okay for him to do as he wishes...
MESSAGE.Translation: Whoa, is it really okay for him to do as he wishes...

MESSAGE.JP: じゃ、と言って、担任は教室を出ていった。
MESSAGE.EN: The teacher left the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: The teacher left the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹になった。よかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm glad it'll be you after all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm glad it'll be you after all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、ごめんね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は僕の彼女だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin is my girlfriend...
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin is my girlfriend...

MESSAGE.JP: その彼が何もしないでいてどうするんだ？
MESSAGE.EN: I'd fail as her boyfriend if I didn't do anything here.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd fail as her boyfriend if I didn't do anything here.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は手を挙げるしかなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no other option but to raise my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no other option but to raise my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「なるほど、適任だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝I see, a perfect match.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝I see, a perfect match.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 何がなるほどなのかよくわからないが、すんなりと通る。
MESSAGE.EN: I wasn't quite sure how to interpret that remark, but at least there were no objections.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wasn't quite sure how to interpret that remark, but at least there were no objections.

MESSAGE.JP: すぐさま、あのふたりがどうとか、浮いた話で教室内がざわめき始める。
MESSAGE.EN: The classroom started buzzing with talk about us two right away.
MESSAGE.Translation: The classroom started buzzing with talk about us two right away.

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「こら、静かに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Hey, keep it down!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Hey, keep it down!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「では、棗と直枝のふたりで決定だ。我が校の代表足るよう尽力してくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Then, Natsume and Naoe, you two will be representing our school. Do your best not to tarnish its name.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Then, Natsume and Naoe, you two will be representing our school. Do your best not to tarnish its name.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「まったく、とんだとばっちりだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Geez, talk about unlucky!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Geez, talk about unlucky!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なにが？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hmm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hmm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「脇に汗かいて乾かしてたら、任命されちまったんだろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You were appointed just because you were drying off your sweaty armpits, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You were appointed just because you were drying off your sweaty armpits, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こいつあほだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝This guy's an idiot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝This guy's an idiot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「自主的にだよ、一応ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just so you know, we volunteered.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just so you know, we volunteered.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「おまえらっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝You guys!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝You guys!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 背後から一喝される。
MESSAGE.EN: Someone's voice roared from behind.
MESSAGE.Translation: Someone's voice roared from behind.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そんなものに自ら時間を割くとは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝To voluntarily cut back your free time for such a reason...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝To voluntarily cut back your free time for such a reason...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「野球を舐めてるのか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Don't underestimate baseball...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Don't underestimate baseball...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 教室に金属バットを持って立つ怪しい大男が（しかも、もう一方の手は骨折している）。
MESSAGE.EN: A giant figure was standing in the classroom, holding a metal bat in his hand (which is to say nothing about his other, broken arm).
MESSAGE.Translation: A giant figure was standing in the classroom, holding a metal bat in his hand (which is to say nothing about his other, broken arm).

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うわぁ…こいつ、やっぱ頭打ってるな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Whoa... Just how bad did he hit his head...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Whoa... Just how bad did he hit his head...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴まで引いてしまっている。
MESSAGE.EN: Even Rin cringed at the sight.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even Rin cringed at the sight.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「野球の道はそんな甘くはないぞ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝The way of the baseball isn't as forgiving as you make it out to be...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝The way of the baseball isn't as forgiving as you make it out to be...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「剣の道はどうでもよくなったのかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What happened to the way of sword, I wonder...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What happened to the way of sword, I wonder...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「まあまあ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Well, now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Well, now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 窓の外から声。
MESSAGE.EN: The voice came from beyond the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: The voice came from beyond the window.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介が、サッシを乗り越えて入ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke came down through the window once again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke came down through the window once again.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「明日一日だけだろ？　大目に見てやれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's just for tomorrow, right? Don't be so harsh on them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's just for tomorrow, right? Don't be so harsh on them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「それよりもそっちの時間がないんじゃないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝More importantly, you don't have much time left, do you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝More importantly, you don't have much time left, do you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「おまえらが挙手してくれたおかげで話を振られずに済んだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Thanks to you, I managed to go scot-free.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Thanks to you, I managed to go scot-free.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾も話に加わってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo joined us in our discussion.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo joined us in our discussion.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「こういう時はここぞとばかりに俺に制服を着せたがるからな、あの担任は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝He's always trying to make me wear my uniform at times likes this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝He's always trying to make me wear my uniform at times likes this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえのほうがおかしいからな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You're the weird one here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You're the weird one here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「おまえもな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Just like you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Just like you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「ようっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Yo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Yo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 窓の外から声。
MESSAGE.EN: The voice came from beyond the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: The voice came from beyond the window.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介が、窓を乗り越えて入ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke came down through the window once again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke came down through the window once again.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「明日なんだろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's tomorrow, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's tomorrow, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「時間がないんじゃないのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You don't have much time left, do you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You don't have much time left, do you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴と僕を見て訊く。
MESSAGE.EN: He queried, looking at us.
MESSAGE.Translation: He queried, looking at us.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんのだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Time for what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Time for what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「お偉いさん方の案内役を仰せつかったんだろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You were appointed to escort those big shots, weren't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You were appointed to escort those big shots, weren't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ちゃんと出来るのか、練習しなくていいのかってことだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm asking if you'll be fine without practicing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm asking if you'll be fine without practicing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そんなもんなんとでもなるし、ならなくてもかまやしねぇだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It'll work out somehow, and even if it doesn't, who cares?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It'll work out somehow, and even if it doesn't, who cares?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえは後輩思いじゃないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Why don't you think of the future underclassmen a little?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Why don't you think of the future underclassmen a little?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あ？　何でここで後輩が出てくるんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh? Why did you bring them up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh? Why did you bring them up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「この学校、生徒も増えてきて手狭になってきたと思わないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Don't you think the school's been packed full lately with all the new students enrolling?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Don't you think the school's been packed full lately with all the new students enrolling?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いや、そんな長いこと居ねぇし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I haven't even been here for that long.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I haven't even been here for that long.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まぁ、学校自体、それほど大きくない気はするけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I certainly feel that the school itself isn't that spacious...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I certainly feel that the school itself isn't that spacious...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「現在、学校の敷地拡張のプランが検討されているんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝At this point in time, a plan to expand the school campus is under consideration.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝At this point in time, a plan to expand the school campus is under consideration.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「運動部のグラウンド争奪とか、けっこう見るだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You've witnessed the struggle over the sports grounds, haven't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You've witnessed the struggle over the sports grounds, haven't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに、校舎や寮の規模に比べて、グラウンドは狭い。
MESSAGE.EN: The sports grounds are relatively small compared to the dormitory and the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sports grounds are relatively small compared to the dormitory and the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: そのことで、ソフト部との一件もあったわけだし。
MESSAGE.EN: The incident with the softball club stemmed from that, as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: The incident with the softball club stemmed from that, as well.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「今回の視察はな、その様子見だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝This time's inspection is to verify this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝This time's inspection is to verify this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「もちろん手狭さを目で確かめる意味もあるが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Of course, it's worthwhile to verify the conditions with your very own eyes...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Of course, it's worthwhile to verify the conditions with your very own eyes...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「その学校の品格をも問いにくる、というわけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But they're also going to assess the qualifications of the school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But they're also going to assess the qualifications of the school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なるほどな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「つまり、この代表のふたりが我が校の品位を貶めるに至れば、後輩たちが狭苦しいままの校舎で過ごすはめになる、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝In other words, if these two representatives damage our school's image, all the future students will have to study in these cramped facilities.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝In other words, if these two representatives damage our school's image, all the future students will have to study in these cramped facilities.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そういうわけだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝There you have it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝There you have it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 携帯が震える。鈴からのメールだ。
MESSAGE.EN: My cellphone vibrated. It was an email from Rin.
MESSAGE.Translation: My cellphone vibrated. It was an email from Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 『なにーΣ(∵)』
MESSAGE.EN: [Say what! Σ(-.-)]
MESSAGE.Translation: [Say what! Σ(-.-)]

MESSAGE.JP: いや、口で言えばいいじゃん…。
MESSAGE.EN: Why don't you use your own mouth...
MESSAGE.Translation: Why don't you use your own mouth...

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「大丈夫か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Will you be fine?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Will you be fine?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 再度、そう問い直される。
MESSAGE.EN: He asked us again.
MESSAGE.Translation: He asked us again.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「だ、大丈夫だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Ye, yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Ye, yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 机に手をついて、体重を支えながら答える。
MESSAGE.EN: She answered while keeping herself standing by leaning on the desk.
MESSAGE.Translation: She answered while keeping herself standing by leaning on the desk.

MESSAGE.JP: なるほど…一応虚勢を張りたかったわけだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I see... She's trying to bluff her way out for the time being.
MESSAGE.Translation: I see... She's trying to bluff her way out for the time being.

MESSAGE.JP: 動揺してるの、ばればれだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Even a blind man would see that she could barely stand on her two feet, though...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even a blind man would see that she could barely stand on her two feet, though...

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ぜんぜん大丈夫じゃなさそうだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It doesn't look like you'll be fine at all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It doesn't look like you'll be fine at all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そのまま卒倒しそうな勢いだったな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's as if you're about to pass out already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's as if you're about to pass out already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「仕方のない奴らだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What a hopeless bunch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What a hopeless bunch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 結局みんなの手を借りることに。
MESSAGE.EN: We ended up having to accept help from everyone.
MESSAGE.Translation: We ended up having to accept help from everyone.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そもそも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝First of all.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝First of all.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴は敬語を使えるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, can you even use polite speech?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, can you even use polite speech?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「当然だ。使えるとも。きっと使える。たぶん使える。使えそうな気はする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Obviously. Well, I can. I'm sure I can. Maybe I can. I have a feeling that I can.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Obviously. Well, I can. I'm sure I can. Maybe I can. I have a feeling that I can.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「恐ろしく微妙だな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's a bit too vague...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's a bit too vague...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「瞬時に自信が失われていく過程は伝わってきたけど…結局のところどうなんだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We saw you losing confidence bit by bit, but... which one is it in the end?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We saw you losing confidence bit by bit, but... which one is it in the end?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どうなんだ、鈴」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Answer, Rin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Answer, Rin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「使えれるらい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I cannd.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I cannd.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「使えれらい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I cannngt.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I cannngt.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴、いつまでもそんなごまかしはきかないぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, do you really think you can keep fooling us like that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, do you really think you can keep fooling us like that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「怒らないから、ちゃんと言ってみろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No one's gonna scold you, so say it properly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No one's gonna scold you, so say it properly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「使えるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝As if I can!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝As if I can!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さて…これは困ったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well then... This is quite a predicament.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well then... This is quite a predicament.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「理樹は大丈夫なんだろ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Will you be fine yourself, Riki?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Will you be fine yourself, Riki?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「多分人並みには…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm about as proficient as anyone else...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm about as proficient as anyone else...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「だったら、鈴は黙って、笑顔だけ浮かべてればいいんじゃないのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Then Rin could just keep quiet and smile all the time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Then Rin could just keep quiet and smile all the time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: みんな、思い思いに想像してみる。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone tried imagining this.
MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone tried imagining this.

MESSAGE.JP: それは一瞬ですんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It didn't last for longer than a fraction of a second.
MESSAGE.Translation: It didn't last for longer than a fraction of a second.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「すまん、自分で言っておきながら、却下させてもらう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I'm sorry. I'm the one who suggested this, but forget the idea.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I'm sorry. I'm the one who suggested this, but forget the idea.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴に愛想笑いなんてできるわけない。
MESSAGE.EN: There's no way she could put on a fake smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's no way she could put on a fake smile.

MESSAGE.JP: 特に相手は知らない大人たち。
MESSAGE.EN: Especially surrounded by unfamiliar people.
MESSAGE.Translation: Especially surrounded by unfamiliar people.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の後ろに隠れているか、関係ない人のようにちょっと離れたところにいってしまうはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She will either hide behind my back or wander off somewhere like she had nothing to do with it.

MESSAGE.Translation: We were silently waiting for Kyousuke's next words.

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…よし、今回はここまで」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Alright, that's it for now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Alright, that's it for now.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Phew...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Phew...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が一息つく。
MESSAGE.EN: She let out a sigh.
MESSAGE.Translation: She let out a sigh.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「案外いけてるんじゃないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It might go surprisingly well, don't you think?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It might go surprisingly well, don't you think?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「自分で言うな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You can't say that yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You can't say that yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「じゃあ、おまえが言え」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Then you say it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Then you say it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「案外いけてるとまでは言えないぞ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I can't say that it'll work out fine yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I can't say that it'll work out fine yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「何度か危ないところがあった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝There were a few close calls.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝There were a few close calls.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「だから、今言えるのは、頑張ってはいるが後もう少しってとこだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What I can say for now, is that you'll have to keep doing your best for a little longer.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What I can say for now, is that you'll have to keep doing your best for a little longer.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なにぃ…褒めて伸びるタイプなのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Say what... Aren't you the type to overpraise people...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Say what... Aren't you the type to overpraise people...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「自分で言うな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Don't say that yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Don't say that yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「あと、謙吾な」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝And one more thing, Kengo.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝And one more thing, Kengo.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「明日は制服な」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Make sure to come in your uniform tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Make sure to come in your uniform tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「うおぉぉおぉぉおお…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Uwoooo...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Uwoooo...❞

MESSAGE.JP: そんなに嫌なんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Does he hate it so much...
MESSAGE.Translation: Does he hate it so much...

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ジャンパーの前、ジッパーでちゃんと首もとまで締めるからっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I'll zip my jumper all the way up, okay!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I'll zip my jumper all the way up, okay!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「締めるからなんなんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝How is that going to change anything?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝How is that going to change anything?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「それでは駄目なのかぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That's still no good, huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That's still no good, huh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あほだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What an idiot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What an idiot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「まさかこのジャンパーをぬぐ日がくるとは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I never thought that the day when I have take off this jumper would come...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I never thought that the day when I have take off this jumper would come...❞

MESSAGE.JP: がちゃーん!!
MESSAGE.EN: *Ka-thump*!!
MESSAGE.Translation: *Ka-thump*!!

MESSAGE.JP: 途端、鈴が顔面からテーブルに突っ伏した。
MESSAGE.EN: At the same moment, Rin collapsed face-on flat on the table.
MESSAGE.Translation: At the same moment, Rin collapsed face-on flat on the table.

MESSAGE.JP: 精根尽き果てた様子だった…。
MESSAGE.EN: She was completely exhausted...
MESSAGE.Translation: She was completely exhausted...

MESSAGE.JP: 放課後すぐいなくなってしまった鈴を、僕は探していた。相当落ち込んでいた様子だったから、心配になって。
MESSAGE.EN: She vanished somewhere after school, and I was looking for her. She had looked depressed, so I was worried about her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She vanished somewhere after school, and I was looking for her. She had looked depressed, so I was worried about her.

MESSAGE.JP: 渡り廊下から見渡せる中庭、いつもならここで猫と一緒にいるはずだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: I passed through the courtyard into the passageway, where she'd normally be playing with her cats...
MESSAGE.Translation: I passed through the courtyard into the passageway, where she'd normally be playing with her cats...

MESSAGE.JP: 木陰を回り込んだところでようやく鈴の姿を見つけた。
MESSAGE.EN: As I was walking around a tree, I finally spotted her figure in the shade behind it.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I was walking around a tree, I finally spotted her figure in the shade behind it.

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ri...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ri...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 呼びかけようとして、僕は動きを止めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was about to call out to her, but stopped myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was about to call out to her, but stopped myself.

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Ugh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Ugh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は体操座りをして俯いている。
MESSAGE.EN: She was sitting with her arms wrapped around her legs, her head hanging.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was sitting with her arms wrapped around her legs, her head hanging.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「まだぶーぶー音がきこえる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I can still hear that beeping sound...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I can still hear that beeping sound...❞

MESSAGE.JP: にゃ…？
MESSAGE.EN: Meow...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow...?

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の周りの猫たちも普段の鈴と空気が違うのがわかるのか、戸惑い気味だ。
MESSAGE.EN: The cats around her felt that she was different from her usual self and were puzzled.
MESSAGE.Translation: The cats around her felt that she was different from her usual self and were puzzled.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…あたし、そーとーダメな子だ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...I can't do anything right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I can't do anything right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 頭の上に競い合って載ろうとしてる二匹の猫を払いのける余力もないらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: She was so tired she even didn't care about the two cats playing king of the hill on her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was so tired she even didn't care about the two cats playing king of the hill on her head.

MESSAGE.JP: うにゃ、うにゃ。
MESSAGE.EN: Meow, meow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow, meow.

MESSAGE.JP: 芝生に寝そべって、じっと鈴を見ていたレノンが、鈴のスカートの端を前足でひっかいている。
MESSAGE.EN: Lennon, who had been lying on the lawn staring at Rin, walked up to her and tugged on the edge of her skirt with his paw.
MESSAGE.Translation: Lennon, who had been lying on the lawn staring at Rin, walked up to her and tugged on the edge of her skirt with his paw.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…ん、どーした、レノン。あたしはいまぶーぶー音との戦いで力尽きてる…ひんしだ…ほっといて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Mm, what is it, Lennon? I spent all my strength fighting against the beeping sound... I'm about to drop dead... Leave me alone...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Mm, what is it, Lennon? I spent all my strength fighting against the beeping sound... I'm about to drop dead... Leave me alone...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 拗ねたように言う鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: She spoke in a sulky voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: She spoke in a sulky voice.

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、瀕死になるのも無理はないぐらいの勢いではあったけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, it was a battle so tough that I really could almost imagine her dropping dead...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, it was a battle so tough that I really could almost imagine her dropping dead...

MESSAGE.JP: うにゃ、にゃ。
MESSAGE.EN: Meow, meow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow, meow.

MESSAGE.JP: けれど、レノンは前足の動きを止めない。
MESSAGE.EN: But Lennon didn't give up and stop moving his paws.
MESSAGE.Translation: But Lennon didn't give up and stop moving his paws.

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...What?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...What?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は微かに顔を上げると、左手を伸ばした。
MESSAGE.EN: She slowly lifted her head up, and extended her left arm.
MESSAGE.Translation: She slowly lifted her head up, and extended her left arm.

MESSAGE.JP: 伸ばした指にレノンが額をすりつける。
MESSAGE.EN: And then patted Lennon on his forehead.
MESSAGE.Translation: And then patted Lennon on his forehead.

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Mm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Mm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は人差し指をちょん、と曲げると、レノンの額にぐりぐり当てた。
MESSAGE.EN: She bent her index finger to rub his forehead in a swirling motion.
MESSAGE.Translation: She bent her index finger to rub his forehead in a swirling motion.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うりうり…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Uriuri...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Uriuri...❞

MESSAGE.JP: にゃー？
MESSAGE.EN: Meow?
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow?

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「お？　あたしに逆らう気かー？　十年はやいわー。うりうり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Huh? Are you challenging me? You're ten years too early for that. Uriuri.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Huh? Are you challenging me? You're ten years too early for that. Uriuri.❞

MESSAGE.JP: にゃにゃっ。
MESSAGE.EN: Me-meow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Me-meow.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…必殺、ねこのひたいはいがいとでっかいぞ攻撃」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Ultimate technique, A Cat's Forehead Is Unexpectedly Large - attack.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Ultimate technique, A Cat's Forehead Is Unexpectedly Large - attack.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴はレノンの頭全体をつつき回した。
MESSAGE.EN: She used her hand to rub his entire head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She used her hand to rub his entire head.

MESSAGE.JP: にゃ、にゃふ～。
MESSAGE.EN: Mew, meooow～.
MESSAGE.Translation: Mew, meooow～.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「情けない声、出さないの。男の子でしょっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Don't let out a pathetic voice like that. Aren't you a boy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Don't let out a pathetic voice like that. Aren't you a boy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: にゃ。レノンはぺろぺろ、と鈴の指を舐めた。
MESSAGE.EN: Meow. He started licking her fingers.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow. He started licking her fingers.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こら、くすぐったい…もう、しょうがないな、レノン…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Hey, it's tickling... Geez, Lennon...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Hey, it's tickling... Geez, Lennon...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴はくすくす笑うと、ぺたん、と膝を崩した。
MESSAGE.EN: She fell on her knees giggling.
MESSAGE.Translation: She fell on her knees giggling.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おいで、レノン」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Come here, Lennon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Come here, Lennon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: にゃー。
MESSAGE.EN: Meow.
MESSAGE.Translation: Meow.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「よしよし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Good boy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Good boy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: うにゃにゃー。それを機に周囲の猫たちがわらわらと寄ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: All the other cats took this opportunity to surround her.
MESSAGE.Translation: All the other cats took this opportunity to surround her.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あたまさらに重たい…って、腕も重たい…こ、こら、スカートもぐらないっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝My head is even more heavy now... Hey, my arms are heavy... Oh come on, don't go under my skirt!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝My head is even more heavy now... Hey, my arms are heavy... Oh come on, don't go under my skirt!❞

MESSAGE.JP: あっという間に鈴は猫で埋もれてしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was buried under cats in a matter of seconds.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was buried under cats in a matter of seconds.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が出る幕もなく、猫たちによって、元気を取り戻したようだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't get a chance to intervene, the cats already made her recover her spirits.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't get a chance to intervene, the cats already made her recover her spirits.

MESSAGE.JP: さわやかな晴天に包まれた朝だけど。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a refreshing morning, the weather was flawless.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a refreshing morning, the weather was flawless.

MESSAGE.JP: 腕時計に目を落とす。まだ午前の８時。
MESSAGE.EN: I shot a glance at the clock. It was still only 8 AM.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shot a glance at the clock. It was still only 8 AM.

MESSAGE.JP: いつもなら準備してる頃だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd usually be getting myself ready at around this time.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd usually be getting myself ready at around this time.

MESSAGE.JP: はっ」
MESSAGE.EN: Hah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Hah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 眠いのか、鈴は時々目をつむり船を漕ぎ出していた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was sleepy to the point where she was struggling to keep her eyes open.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was sleepy to the point where she was struggling to keep her eyes open.

MESSAGE.JP: 無理もないか。昨日はあれだけ大変な思いをしたんだから。
MESSAGE.EN: I wasn't surprised, seeing how she'd had a really rough time yesterday.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wasn't surprised, seeing how she'd had a really rough time yesterday.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大丈夫？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「だいじょうぶ…まかせろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm alright... Leave it to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm alright... Leave it to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 声が寝てる。大丈夫じゃないかも…。
MESSAGE.EN: Her voice was drowsy. She didn't appear alright to me...
MESSAGE.Translation: Her voice was drowsy. She didn't appear alright to me...

MESSAGE.JP: 正門に黒塗りの高級車が止まり、中からどこかで見たことあるお爺さんと恰幅のいいおじさんが出てきた。
MESSAGE.EN: A black luxury car halted at the front gate; an old man whom I'd seen somewhere before and a fit-looking man got out of it.
MESSAGE.Translation: A black luxury car halted at the front gate; an old man whom I'd seen somewhere before and a fit-looking man got out of it.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あのお爺さんが理事長かな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That old man must be the superintendent...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That old man must be the superintendent...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「たしか事務棟に銅像があった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I think there's a bronze statue of him on the campus.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I think there's a bronze statue of him on the campus.❞

MESSAGE.JP: さすがに似ていたので顔を思い出せた。
MESSAGE.EN: He did bear an uncanny resemblance to the statue.
MESSAGE.Translation: He did bear an uncanny resemblance to the statue.

MESSAGE.JP: ということは議員さんはおじさんの方か。
MESSAGE.EN: So, that other man must be the representative of the prefectural assembly.
MESSAGE.Translation: So, that other man must be the representative of the prefectural assembly.

MESSAGE.JP: よし、ミッションスタートだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Alright, Mission Start.
MESSAGE.Translation: Alright, Mission Start.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちは担任と一緒に、車の近くで迎える。
MESSAGE.EN: We proceeded to greet the visitors together with our homeroom teacher.
MESSAGE.Translation: We proceeded to greet the visitors together with our homeroom teacher.

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「本日はご足労ありがとうございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Thank you for coming all the way here today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Thank you for coming all the way here today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `担任@「学内の案内ですが、２年Ｅ組の直枝と棗がご案内致します」
MESSAGE.EN: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Naoe and Natsume from 2-E will be showing you around the school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Naoe and Natsume from 2-E will be showing you around the school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちは紹介されて、一歩前に出る。
MESSAGE.EN: We took a step forward after being introduced.
MESSAGE.Translation: We took a step forward after being introduced.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「初めまして。２年Ｅ組の直枝です。今日はゆっくりご見学ください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hello. I'm Naoe from class 2-E. Please take your time with the inspection.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hello. I'm Naoe from class 2-E. Please take your time with the inspection.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `議員@「はい、よろしく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Assembly Member@❝Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Assembly Member@❝Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: にこにこと笑顔を絶やさない人だ。
MESSAGE.EN: He seemed the type to always have a smile on his face.
MESSAGE.Translation: He seemed the type to always have a smile on his face.

MESSAGE.JP: 優しそうな人なので、とりあえず一安心。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt relieved, seeing that he looked like a kind person.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt relieved, seeing that he looked like a kind person.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は握手して一歩下がった。
MESSAGE.EN: I shook his hand and took a step back.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shook his hand and took a step back.

MESSAGE.JP: 今度は鈴の番だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Rin's turn.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Rin's turn.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は議員さんのほうではなく、こちらを向いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't turn to the assembly member, but to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't turn to the assembly member, but to me.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@（ゆっくりぃぃ？）
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@(Take your time!?)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@(Take your time!?)

MESSAGE.JP: 予定と違うじゃないか、と訴えるような目で口をわなわなと動かしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She spelled out the words, as if trying to point out that it hadn't gone according to the plan.
MESSAGE.Translation: She spelled out the words, as if trying to point out that it hadn't gone according to the plan.

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに。議員さんの穏やかな身のこなしにつられて、挨拶の内容を変えてしまっていたことに気付く。
MESSAGE.EN: She was right. He made such a good impression on me that I got carried away and changed the words a bit.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was right. He made such a good impression on me that I got carried away and changed the words a bit.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（鈴は予定通りでいいよ）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Just follow the plan, Rin.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Just follow the plan, Rin.)

MESSAGE.JP: そう耳打ちする。
MESSAGE.EN: I whispered to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I whispered to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `議員@「こちらは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Assembly Member@❝And this is?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Assembly Member@❝And this is?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 議員さんが鈴を見て担任に訊いた。その前に、鈴が歩み出る。
MESSAGE.EN: He asked our homeroom teacher while looking at Rin. But before he had time to answer, she took a step forward.
MESSAGE.Translation: He asked our homeroom teacher while looking at Rin. But before he had time to answer, she took a step forward.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「２年Ｅ組の棗です。ゆっくりよろしくお願いします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm Natsume from 2-E... Please take your time to meet me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm Natsume from 2-E... Please take your time to meet me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 混ざってしまっていた!!
MESSAGE.EN: She mixed up the greetings!
MESSAGE.Translation: She mixed up the greetings!

MESSAGE.JP: `議員@「ふむ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Assembly Member@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Assembly Member@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Assembly Member@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Assembly Member@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Assembly Member@❝......❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Assembly Member@❝......❞

MESSAGE.JP: `議員@「…よろしく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Assembly Member@❝...Nice to meet you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Assembly Member@❝...Nice to meet you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ゆっくりよろしくされた!!
MESSAGE.EN: He took his time to meet her!
MESSAGE.Translation: He took his time to meet her!

MESSAGE.JP: その後、くすくすと笑い出す。
MESSAGE.EN: He chuckled heartily after that.
MESSAGE.Translation: He chuckled heartily after that.

MESSAGE.JP: `議員@「面白い子だね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Assembly Member@❝What an interesting child.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Assembly Member@❝What an interesting child.❞

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、悪い印象じゃなさそうだからいいか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, he didn't seem to have gotten a bad impression of her, so it's all good...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, he didn't seem to have gotten a bad impression of her, so it's all good...

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒@「おはようございまーす」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student@❝Good morning!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student@❝Good morning!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒@「おはようーっす」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student@❝Morning!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student@❝Morning!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 思い思いに、校門の前にいる先生へ挨拶する生徒。
MESSAGE.EN: The students passing through the school gates were greeting each other.
MESSAGE.Translation: The students passing through the school gates were greeting each other.

MESSAGE.JP: よくある朝の風景を、僕たちは眺めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the usual scene we saw every morning.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the usual scene we saw every morning.

MESSAGE.JP: 理事長は時折議員さんの耳元に囁き、何かしら喋っている。
MESSAGE.EN: The superintendent was whispering something to the assembly member every now and then.
MESSAGE.Translation: The superintendent was whispering something to the assembly member every now and then.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕と鈴は横で立っているだけで済んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin and I simply stood to the side.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin and I simply stood to the side.

MESSAGE.JP: `議員@「君たちは寮住まいですか？」

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes, I do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes, I do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `議員@「練習の邪魔にならない程度にお話を伺いたいのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Assembly Member@❝I'd like to have a talk with them. I promise not to take up too much time from their practice.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Assembly Member@❝I'd like to have a talk with them. I promise not to take up too much time from their practice.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そこまで話が進んで、自分の勘違いに気づく。
MESSAGE.EN: I awakened to my mistake after he said this.
MESSAGE.Translation: I awakened to my mistake after he said this.

MESSAGE.JP: グラウンドの使用状況を把握したいんだ。だったら、武道場を使っている剣道部の謙吾では意味がない。
MESSAGE.EN: If he wanted to see how the sports grounds were being utilized, Kengo, who's training in the dojo, would be of no help to him at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: If he wanted to see how the sports grounds were being utilized, Kengo, who's training in the dojo, would be of no help to him at all.

MESSAGE.JP: 困った…。
MESSAGE.EN: What should I do now...
MESSAGE.Translation: What should I do now...

MESSAGE.JP: 隣をちらりと見る。鈴にそんな友達がいるはずもなく。
MESSAGE.EN: I shot a glance to my left. Rin couldn't possibly have a friend like that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I shot a glance to my left. Rin couldn't possibly have a friend like that.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「どうした？　具合でも悪いのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's wrong? Are you not feeling well?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's wrong? Are you not feeling well?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、鈴にはいないよね…運動部の友達」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, I was just thinking... You don't have a friend in any of the sports clubs, do you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, I was just thinking... You don't have a friend in any of the sports clubs, do you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 小声で鈴に訊いてみた。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked her quietly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked her quietly.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…いないな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...I don't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I don't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「でも、知り合いならいる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But I have an acquaintance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But I have an acquaintance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　どこに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? Where?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? Where?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 聞き返すと同時に、ひとりだけ、僕も思い当たる。
MESSAGE.EN: Even though I asked her, only one person came to mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even though I asked her, only one person came to mind.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ソフトボール部に」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝In the softball club.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝In the softball club.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「えーと、こちらがささがわささみです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Err... This is Sasagawa Sasami.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Err... This is Sasagawa Sasami.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ご紹介にあずかりました、わたくし、ソフトボール部の笹瀬川佐々美と申します」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Let me introduce myself, my name is Sasami Sasasegawa, I am a member of the softball club.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Let me introduce myself, my name is Sasami Sasasegawa, I am a member of the softball club.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「えーと、こちらが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Err... This is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Err... This is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…だれだおまえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Who were you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Who were you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ひとの名前くらいちゃんと覚えなさいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Why don't you remember my name for a change!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Why don't you remember my name for a change!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぺしっ、と鈴の頭をはたく。
MESSAGE.EN: She smacked Rin on the head.
MESSAGE.Translation: She smacked Rin on the head.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うーっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Ugh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Ugh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 唸るが言い返さない。
MESSAGE.EN: She groaned but didn't fight back.
MESSAGE.Translation: She groaned but didn't fight back.

MESSAGE.JP: いつものように喧嘩に発展しないよう、ちゃんと我慢をしてるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was holding back so that it wouldn't develop into a fight like usual.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was holding back so that it wouldn't develop into a fight like usual.

MESSAGE.JP: `議員@「乱暴はいけませんよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Assembly Member@❝Violence is bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Assembly Member@❝Violence is bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あら、今のはじゃれ合いですわ。いつものことですのでお気になさらず」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Oh, I was hardly serious just now. It is merely something we do all the time, so please do not let it get to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Oh, I was hardly serious just now. It is merely something we do all the time, so please do not let it get to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: その言葉を訊いて悪い予感がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I got a bad feeling from her words.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got a bad feeling from her words.

MESSAGE.JP: もしかして、笹瀬川さん、議員さんの前では鈴が大人しくしているのをいいことに、仕返しでも企んでるんじゃ…。
MESSAGE.EN: With Rin having to act docile, Sasasegawa-san could be planning to use this opportunity to get back at her...
MESSAGE.Translation: With Rin having to act docile, Sasasegawa-san could be planning to use this opportunity to get back at her...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「わたくし、ソフトボール部の笹瀬川佐々美と申します」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I am Sasami Sasasegawa from the softball club.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I am Sasami Sasasegawa from the softball club.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「２年で、４番とピッチャーを任されております」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I am in the second year, and the pitcher and fourth batter of the team.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I am in the second year, and the pitcher and fourth batter of the team.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `議員@「ほぅ、それはすごいですな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Assembly Member@❝Ooh, that's impressive.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Assembly Member@❝Ooh, that's impressive.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「大したことありませんわ。妥当なポジションでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝That much is nothing special. It is only the position I am best suited for.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That much is nothing special. It is only the position I am best suited for.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そのわたくしに、どのようなご用件でしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝And what kind of business do you happen to have with me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝And what kind of business do you happen to have with me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `議員@「棗さんのご友人に、運動部がグラウンドの使用で困ってる話を伺いにきたのですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Assembly Member@❝I heard that you're Natsume-san's friend, and I'd like to ask you about the difficulties that sports clubs are having using the sports grounds.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Assembly Member@❝I heard that you're Natsume-san's friend, and I'd like to ask you about the difficulties that sports clubs are having using the sports grounds.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「なるほど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 議員さんの隣には理事長もいる。
MESSAGE.EN: The superintendent was standing next to the assembly member.
MESSAGE.Translation: The superintendent was standing next to the assembly member.

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川佐々美にとっては、部として登録されていない僕ら草野球チームを追放する最高の機会である。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a perfect chance for her to get rid of our sandlot team that wasn't even registered as a club.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a perfect chance for her to get rid of our sandlot team that wasn't even registered as a club.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちのことを告げ口すればいいだけなんだから。
MESSAGE.EN: She only had to inform him of us.
MESSAGE.Translation: She only had to inform him of us.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちは理事長からお咎めを受ける。
MESSAGE.EN: We would likely be criticized by the superintendent.
MESSAGE.Translation: We would likely be criticized by the superintendent.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、グラウンドには僕らが居なくなるぶん余裕ができる。
MESSAGE.EN: And we would never step on the sports grounds again.
MESSAGE.Translation: And we would never step on the sports grounds again.

MESSAGE.JP: 拡張の必要なしと判断され、僕たちふたりの任務は失敗に終わる。
MESSAGE.EN: If they judged that there was hence no need to expand the grounds, we'd fail that mission as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: If they judged that there was hence no need to expand the grounds, we'd fail that mission as well.

MESSAGE.JP: 絶好の仕返しの場じゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a perfect set-up for revenge.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a perfect set-up for revenge.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴はそこまで考えが及ばず、ただ思いつきだけで、彼女を紹介したに違いない。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin hadn't thought things through that well; she'd mentioned her name only because no one else came to mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin hadn't thought things through that well; she'd mentioned her name only because no one else came to mind.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕がもっと早く気付き、止めるべきだったんだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I should have noticed this earlier and prevented it...
MESSAGE.Translation: I should have noticed this earlier and prevented it...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「では…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Then...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Then...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「説明させていただきますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Let me explain the situation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Let me explain the situation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんは、理路整然と運動部の現状を話し始めた。
MESSAGE.EN: In one flowing speech, Sasasegawa-san perfectly and coherently articulated the state of affairs in the sports clubs.
MESSAGE.Translation: In one flowing speech, Sasasegawa-san perfectly and coherently articulated the state of affairs in the sports clubs.

MESSAGE.JP: それはいつもの高圧的な態度とは違い、公平で素晴らしい説明だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Completely unlike her usual exaggeratedly haughty tone, she was explaining in a wondrously straight-forward manner.
MESSAGE.Translation: Completely unlike her usual exaggeratedly haughty tone, she was explaining in a wondrously straight-forward manner.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はその変わりようをぽかんと眺めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was just looking at her in blank amazement.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was just looking at her in blank amazement.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、最後まで、僕らの草野球の話は出てこなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: What's more, she didn't mention our sandlot team even once.
MESSAGE.Translation: What's more, she didn't mention our sandlot team even once.

MESSAGE.JP: `議員@「今日はありがとう。いろいろ手間をかけましたね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Assembly Member@❝Thank you for everything today. You have worked really hard.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Assembly Member@❝Thank you for everything today. You have worked really hard.❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぎゅっと手を握られる。大きくて温かい手だ。
MESSAGE.EN: We shook hands. He had big and really warm hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: We shook hands. He had big and really warm hands.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いえ、こちらこそありがとうございます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, we're grateful that you paid us a visit today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, we're grateful that you paid us a visit today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `議員@「そちらのお嬢さん、棗さんにも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Assembly Member@❝And the young lady, Natsume-san, too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Assembly Member@❝And the young lady, Natsume-san, too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴も気恥ずかしそうに手を取った。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin sheepishly shook his hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin sheepishly shook his hand.

MESSAGE.JP: `議員@「こう言っては失礼ですが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Assembly Member@❝I know it's rude of me to say this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Assembly Member@❝I know it's rude of me to say this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `議員@「あなたはとても不器用な人だと思います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Assembly Member@❝I think you're a really awkward person.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Assembly Member@❝I think you're a really awkward person.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `議員@「でも一生懸命だった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Assembly Member@❝But you're really earnest.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Assembly Member@❝But you're really earnest.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `議員@「あなたたちのクラスもそれは同じ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Assembly Member@❝The same goes for your class as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Assembly Member@❝The same goes for your class as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `議員@「作法も何もなくても、活気だけは人一倍ある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Assembly Member@❝You might have poor manners, but you somehow seem full of life compared to the others.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Assembly Member@❝You might have poor manners, but you somehow seem full of life compared to the others.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `議員@「きみたちを駆り立てるもの、それは一体なんだね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Assembly Member@❝Can you tell me, what is it that drives you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Assembly Member@❝Can you tell me, what is it that drives you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: それは…
MESSAGE.EN: That is...
MESSAGE.Translation: That is...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は考えようとした。
MESSAGE.EN: I started to ponder.
MESSAGE.Translation: I started to ponder.

MESSAGE.JP: けど、鈴が呆気なく答えを口にしていた。
MESSAGE.EN: But Rin gave an immediate answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: But Rin gave an immediate answer.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「みんながいるからだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝The people around us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝The people around us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんて容易く言ってのけるんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: How could she say it with such confidence?
MESSAGE.Translation: How could she say it with such confidence?

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が時間をかけて考えていたとしても同じ答えに辿りついていただろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder if I would have reached the same answer after thinking for a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder if I would have reached the same answer after thinking for a while.

MESSAGE.JP: `議員@「なるほど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Assembly Member@❝I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Assembly Member@❝I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `議員@「その気持ちを忘れずに…これからも頑張っていきなさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Assembly Member@❝Don't forget this feeling... Keep doing your best from now on, as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Assembly Member@❝Don't forget this feeling... Keep doing your best from now on, as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 議員さんは手を離し、車に乗り込むとそのまま去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: He released his hand, stepped into the car, and in a few moments they were already out of sight.
MESSAGE.Translation: He released his hand, stepped into the car, and in a few moments they were already out of sight.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふぅ…終わった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Phew... It's over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Phew... It's over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よく頑張ったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You did well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You did well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「まー、なんてことない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Well, that was a breeze.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Well, that was a breeze.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そう言って笑ってみせた。
MESSAGE.EN: She said and smiled at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She said and smiled at me.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が直立したまま、傾き出す。
MESSAGE.EN: While she was standing up straight, she suddenly started falling over like a pencil.
MESSAGE.Translation: While she was standing up straight, she suddenly started falling over like a pencil.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわぁ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 慌てて、それを支える。
MESSAGE.EN: I hurried to support her body.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hurried to support her body.

MESSAGE.JP: そのままへなへなと腰砕けになる鈴。
MESSAGE.EN: She was so exhausted she could no longer stand straight.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was so exhausted she could no longer stand straight.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「だいじょうぶ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ううん、あんまり…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No, not really...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No, not really...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「つかれた…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I'm tired...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I'm tired...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ここでねる…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Let me sleep here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Let me sleep here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「駄目だって！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You can't!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You can't!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は鈴を抱えると、そのまま寮につれて帰った。
MESSAGE.EN: Holding Rin on her feet, I brought her back to the dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: Holding Rin on her feet, I brought her back to the dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: 後日。
MESSAGE.EN: A few days later.
MESSAGE.Translation: A few days later.

MESSAGE.JP: 珍しくひとりだった笹瀬川さんに廊下でばったり会うと、あの時の事を聞いてみることにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I ran into Sasasegawa-san in the corridor. To my amazement, she was alone, so I asked her about that day.
MESSAGE.Translation: I ran into Sasasegawa-san in the corridor. To my amazement, she was alone, so I asked her about that day.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしてリトルバスターズのこと、言わなかったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why didn't you mention the Little Busters to them?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why didn't you mention the Little Busters to them?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「棗さん、いらっしゃらないわね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Natsume-san is not present?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Natsume-san is not present?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、でもどうして？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, so why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, so why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…負けたからですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Because I lost.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Because I lost.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「このわたくしが三球三振に討ち取られましたのよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I made three swings and still could not hit the ball!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I made three swings and still could not hit the ball!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「その上、告げ口のようにグラウンドを奪うなんてプライドが許しませんわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝My pride would not allow me to mention that you took away the sports grounds.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝My pride would not allow me to mention that you took away the sports grounds.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「棗さんに伝えていただけるかしら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I wonder if you can relay this to Natsume-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I wonder if you can relay this to Natsume-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「笹瀬川佐々美は正々堂々とあなたを打ち破ってグラウンドを明け渡させる、と」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝That I, Sasami Sasasegawa, will bring her down in a fair match and take the sports grounds back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That I, Sasami Sasasegawa, will bring her down in a fair match and take the sports grounds back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「それだけですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝That is all there is to it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That is all there is to it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「もうひとつ付け加えるなら、宮沢様の制服姿が見れてご機嫌だったというのもありますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Also, Miyazawa-sama looked so wonderful in his school uniform that I was in a great mood.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Also, Miyazawa-sama looked so wonderful in his school uniform that I was in a great mood.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「これも伝えていただけるかしら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Could you relay this as well?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Could you relay this as well?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「制服姿がとてもお似合いで素敵でしたと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝That the school uniform looks wonderful on him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝That the school uniform looks wonderful on him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 自分で言えばいいのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: You could tell him yourself...
MESSAGE.Translation: You could tell him yourself...

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり笹瀬川さんは変わらないけど、ちょっと見方が変わったかも知れない。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san is still Sasasegawa-san, but I've slightly changed my opinion of her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san is still Sasasegawa-san, but I've slightly changed my opinion of her.

SELECT.JP: 励ます$dそっとしておく
